data.text:
Monaco Hickey, A Division of Roberts Co is proud to be engaged by the Victorian School Building Authority (VSBA) on the upgrade and modernisation works at Ringwood Secondary College, Sunbury West Primary School and Gisborne Secondary College.

The project at Ringwood Secondary College includes a new STEAM (science, technology, engineering, arts and mathematics) building and canteen.

Sunbury West Primary School works include a new administration wing, refurbishing buildings and landscaping – with new outdoor sports courts and play areas.

Gisborne Secondary College can expect a new trades hub, providing students with modern, innovative, hands-on learning spaces. The school will also be upgraded and modernised, including Block B, plus new basketball and netball towers.

Monaco Hickey Director, Patrick Hickey is looking forward to delivering these projects for the VSBA.

“Since launching Monaco Hickey in 1994, the company has focused on delivering complex projects across multiple sectors including pharmaceutical, education, sports and recreation. Following the successful completion at CSL Global Headquarters in August, the team are excited to be working across the three school upgrades for the VSBA.”
